original_text: Perhaps you may see your enemy's donkey when it is carrying a heavy load. If the donkey has fallen down, do not refuse to give help. Do not leave the donkey there.
korean_text: 네가 만일 너를 미워하는 자의 나귀가 짐을 싣고 엎드러짐을 보거든 그것을 버려두지 말고 그것을 도와 그 짐을 부릴지니라

sentences.original_text: Perhaps you may see your enemy's donkey
sentences.korean_translation: 어쩌면 당신은 원수의 나귀를 볼지도 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: when it is carrying a heavy load
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 무거운 짐을 실어 나를 때

sentences.original_text: If the donkey has fallen down
do not refuse to give help
Do not leave the donkey there
